detailsData.title: Personalized Attention
detailsData.content: David Badanes personally handles each client and matter, ensuring personalized attention. Clients receive prompt responses to emails and calls, often within the same business day.

detailsData.title: Extensive Experience
detailsData.content: David Badanes has extensive experience in divorce, child custody, and family law matters. He is dedicated to providing knowledgeable and caring representation with a successful track record.

detailsData.title: Educator and Speaker
detailsData.content: David Badanes is a recognized expert speaker and ongoing lecturer for Marino Legal Academy for Matrimonial Law. He provides valuable insights and guidance through his educational courses.
